channel.title: Record notes with a playing surface in Auxy

item.title: Record notes with a playing surface in Auxy
item.dc:creator: Db909
item.description:
ABSOLUTELY. I’ve tried to imagine an Auxy playing surface before and come up short in my imagination. Nothing really nailed the smooth aesthetic of everything else. But I’m sure the team could come up with something cool. Personally I agree with the XY esque approach. Figure and ikaossilator being the prime examples of that. The big question is how do you handle chords? Unless it was somehow made clear that it’s just for melodies. I dunno. But yeah, would be AMAZING.
